homeHeader.title: Build Instant Trust, Win High-Value Contracts, & Drive Revenue with Your Event Permit in Dubai
homeHeader.description: Lost in Dubai’s complex event regulations and approval maze? Our end-to-end event licensing services handle all the paperwork, submission, and compliance, so you can focus on booking premium UAE venues, expand international reach, and secure lucrative government contracts. Capitalise on the Emirate’s thriving events calendar and unique culture with our specialised licensing solutions, empowering you with a 100% compliant license within days, not weeks.

leftSection_5.title: How to Get Your UAE Event License in 5 Easy Steps

items.title: Issue Your License

items.title: List Your Events
items.description: With your event license, you can now host and manage exciting sports, educational, and cultural events across the UAE.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: How long does it take to get a Dubai event management license
items.answer: Typically, it takes 1-7 working days to secure a Free Zone or Mainland event license, depending on your selected jurisdiction and document readiness.

items.question: Can I operate across the UAE with an event permit?
items.answer: Yes, a Mainland license allows you to operate within and beyond the UAE. However, you'll need a local service agent if you plan to launch in a Free Zone.

items.question: Will I have to secure a new permit for each event?
items.answer: Yes, you'll have to secure an event permit for each individual event.

items.question: How many visas can I secure under an event license?
items.answer: Your visa quotas can vary based on office space size and jurisdiction rules.

items.question: Can One Nexuz help me renew my event license in the UAE?
items.answer: Yes, our expert business consultants can assist with renewals, helping you compile documents and pay the necessary fees.
